name: Bosque Maia
description: A serene urban park featuring walking trails, a lake, and playgrounds, perfect for relaxation and outdoor activities.

name: Zoológico Municipal de Guarulhos
address: Av. Da. Glória Pagnoncelli, 344, Guarulhos, SP
description: A municipal zoo housing a variety of animal species, providing educational and recreational experiences.
cost: R$10 for adults, R$5 for children (varies)

name: Parque Shopping Maia
address: Av. Bartholomeu de Carlos, 230 (R. Dona Tecla), Guarulhos, SP, 07097-420
description: A popular shopping mall with retail stores, dining options, and entertainment facilities.
cost: Free to enter, but shopping and entertainment costs vary

name: Catedral Nossa Senhora da Conceição
description: A historic cathedral known for its architectural beauty and cultural significance.

name: Shopping Bonsucesso
address: Av. Dom Pedro II, 176, Guarulhos, SP, 07180-000
description: A shopping center featuring retail stores, dining options, and entertainment services. A popular spot for both shopping and leisure.
cost: Free to enter, but shopping and entertainment costs vary

name: Lago dos Patos
description: A picturesque lake in a park, perfect for leisurely walks and enjoying nature.

name: Cinépolis
description: A modern cinema complex offering the latest movie releases in a comfortable setting.

name: Museu de Arte de Guarulhos
description: A local museum showcasing contemporary art exhibitions and cultural events.
cost: R$15 for adults, R$7 for students
